name: Solareum
description: Solareum is an Ethereum (ERC-20) project featuring gasless rewards without the need to claim, and delivers a renewable energy generation-based blockchain. Solareum creates the novel Proof of Generation (PoG) consensus mechanism, and a dual validation mechanism for validating and securing the network. Solareum decentralizes the monetization of generated renewable energy without a middleman. From renewable energy generation, mining coins, depositing to an exchange, putting them on a crypto credit card till withdrawing cash from an ATM or payments in stores.
